channel.title: Http on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Http on Notes

item.title: HTTP protocol
item.description: Intro What for used to fetch network resources (documents) based on their hostname and path dominant document type - WWW of hypertext documents dominant version - HTTP/1.1 Python libraries urllib - client in Standard Library, for simple use from urllib.request import urlopen import urllib.error r = urlopen('http://httpbin.org/headers') # you need to instruct urllib how to turn raw bytes into text print(r.read().decode('ascii')) requests - the go-to tool
